Utils¶

holisticai.utils is a python module which contains utility functions for plotting and formatting.

Formatting¶

From pandas df to numpy arrays

holisticai.utils.extract_group_vectors(...)

Extract Group Vectors

holisticai.utils.mat_to_binary(mat[, top, ...])

Formatting helper function - makes a matrix binary

holisticai.utils.normalize_tensor(tensor)

Formatting helper function - normalises a tensor to [0,1] range

Recommender formatter
